# 数学之美、浪潮之巅（谷歌黑板报）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/shuxue-zhimei-langchao-zhidian-guge-heibanbao
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/shuxue-zhimei-langchao-zhidian-guge-heibanbao
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install shuxue-zhimei-langchao-zhidian-guge-heibanbao
shuxue-zhimei-langchao-zhidian-guge-heibanbao <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g shuxue-zhimei-langchao-zhidian-guge-heibanbao
shuxue-zhimei-langchao-zhidian-guge-heibanbao <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
